title: Hot Wheels 2018 Gran Turismo "The Real Driving Simulator" Bundle Set of 8 Die-Cast Cars, 1:64 Scale
feature: Includes: 8 individually packaged 1:64 scaled die-cast vehicles.
Set includes Nissan Skyline GT-R (R34), Renault Sport R.S. 01, 2008 Lancer Evolution, '14 Corvette Stingray, Renault Megane Trophy, BMW M4, Ford GT, McLaren F1 GTR.
Each item is numbered from 1 to 8. There are 8 items in a complete set.
Scale: 1:64 DieCast Metal With Some Plastic Parts
description: Hot Wheels® celebrates the sophisticated style of authentic vehicles the Gran Turismo way. The ever-popular Gran Turismo® Racing Simulator is back. This 8-car assortment features authentically styled muscle cars, import cars and hot exotic cars that are showcased in the popular video game franchise. These iconic media vehicles are immortalized in this assortment of exclusive models for gamers and fans. Collect them all!
